```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(include = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(HelpersMG)
library(readr)
```


```{r Load_data_set_1}
average <- read_csv("raw_data/WHO-COVID-19-global-data.csv")
average <- filter(average, Country == "United States of America")
a <- ggplot(average,aes(x=Date_reported,y=Cumulative_cases, group_by(Country))) + geom_line() +theme(legend.position = "bottom") + labs(title = "Cumulative cases in the United States")

print(a)
```

```{r Load_data_set_2}
CityAverage <- read_tsv("raw_data/us_metro_confirmed_cases_cdl.tsv")
CityAverage <- filter(CityAverage, Metropolitan == "Chicago-Joliet-Naperville IL-IN-WI")
CityAverage <- pivot_longer(CityAverage, -Metropolitan, names_to = "Date", values_to = "Cumulative Cases")
CityAverage <- CityAverage[20:200,]
b <- ggplot(CityAverage,aes(x=Date,y="Cumulative Cases"")) + geom_abline() +theme(legend.position = "bottom") + labs(title = "Cumulative cases in the United States")
print(b)
```
